title: The Ultimate Customization
subtitle: For when you need to throw out the rulebook.

leftBullets.title: Build Your Own System
leftBullets.description: Combine `FocusScope`s, custom policies, and manual control to build a completely bespoke navigation system.

leftBullets.title: Total Control, Total Responsibility
leftBullets.description: This approach gives you fine-grained control, but requires you to manage the entire focus state yourself.

leftBullets.title: For Unique Layouts
leftBullets.description: Ideal for highly unconventional UIs, like radial menus or non-grid layouts, where standard policies don't apply.

leftBullets.title: The Last Resort
leftBullets.description: This is a high-effort solution for complex problems. Always try to use the built-in system first!
